related_products.short_desc: Tableau Software helps people see and understand data. Tableau delivers fast analytics, visualization and business intelligence.

Then share your work with anyone and make an impact on your business. From global enterprises to early-stage startups and small businesses, people everywhere use Tableau to see and understand their data.

A range of tools for document storage, data warehousing, security key enforcement, app creation, API management, AI and machine learning are also available.

similar_products.short_desc: Freshpaint detects customer actions automatically on your site, then sends the data to 100s of analytics and advertising tools.
similar_products.features: To make better decisions you need customer data, but it shouldn't require engineers to code every event. Freshpaint detects clicks and actions automatically on your site, then sends the data to 100s of analytics and advertising tools using prebuilt integrations. Forgot to track an event? Freshpaint gives you answers today instead of two weeks from now by backfilling historical data from any new event. For digital health startups, Freshpaint signs BAAs and is 100% purpose-built to manage PHI.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Data Governance software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Data Governance tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Data Governance software combines big data analytics, storage, and security in one modern platform. CIOs and data administrators can use Data Governance software to manage how their organizations use and analyze data throughout its lifecycle, including defensible deletion practices. Concerned about maintaining and protecting your organization's data? Be sure to check out our other categories for Compliance software, Database Management software, Policy Management software, and Risk Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Database Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Database Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Database Management software stores data in a structured format so it can be easily managed and retrieved. These applications allow greater ability to manage, manipulate and combine disparate data from multiple non-relational sources. By combining an integrated, enterprise-wide data access point with the capability for extensive search, manipulation and reporting functions, Database Management solutions enable organizations to make better, broader and more efficient use of key data. Database Management software is related to Business Continuity software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Master Data Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Master Data Management software serves as a central repository for enterprise data collected from multiple sources, cleaned, verified, and organized in a way that helps link dispersed data points together.

category_features.name: Access Controls/Permissions
category_features.definition: Define levels of authorization for access to specific files/folders

category_features.name: Alerts/Notifications
category_features.definition: Alerts/notifications within the system

category_features.name: Capacity Management
category_features.definition: Monitor/analyze service demand and performance to plan for adequate resources to meet current/future business requirements

category_features.name: Compliance Management
category_features.definition: Track and manage non-adherence to policies in a service, product, process, or supplier behavior

category_features.name: Dashboard
category_features.definition: An assembly of graphs and charts for tracking statistics and metrics

category_features.name: IT Reporting
category_features.definition: Assemble and deliver relevant data points for IT

category_features.name: Inventory Management
category_features.definition: Track and manage the quantity of resources on hand to maintain proper supply

category_features.name: Issue Auditing
category_features.definition: Track and monitor past issues and issue changes

category_features.name: License Management
category_features.definition: Track and organize the number of licenses available to the organization

category_features.name: Maintenance Scheduling
category_features.definition: Schedule predetermined or ad hoc maintenance services and labor requests

category_features.name: Patch Management
category_features.definition: Install software updates and bug fixes remotely

category_features.name: Remote Access/Control
category_features.definition: Access a computer or data from a distant location

category_features.name: Backup Log
category_features.definition: Records the events that occur during a backup process

category_features.name: Backup Scheduling
category_features.definition: Allows automatic backups (with all filtering, compressing, transferring to the storage, and other)

category_features.name: Cloud Backup
category_features.definition: Allows back up of files to cloud storage like Google Drive, OneDrive, Dropbox

category_features.name: Compression
category_features.definition: Reduction in the number of bits needed to represent data

category_features.name: Encryption
category_features.definition: Convert data into a code for security

category_features.name: Incremental Backup
category_features.definition: Copy only the new data that has been changed or created since the previous backup

category_features.name: Data Security
category_features.definition: Protect digital privacy and secure data

category_features.name: Endpoint Protection
category_features.definition: Protect users working remotely and provide secure environments for personal devices to access company programs

category_features.name: Network Security
category_features.definition: Prevent and monitor unauthorized access, misuse, modification, or denial of a computer network and network-accessible resources

category_features.name: Real Time Monitoring
category_features.definition: Track system's health and performance continuously with information and updates being available instantly at any point in time

category_features.name: Behavioral Analytics
category_features.definition: Track and analyse user behavior within a system or network

category_features.name: Access Controls/Permissions
category_features.definition: Regulate who can view and use the system by setting permissions and issuing passwords

category_features.name: Activity Monitoring
category_features.definition: Track and report on everything that happens within the system

category_features.name: Firewalls
category_features.definition: Monitor and control traffic based on predetermined rules

category_features.name: Intrusion Detection System
category_features.definition: Identify and alert about security breaches by third parties

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: View and track pertinent metrics

category_features.name: Threat Response
category_features.definition: Identify security issues and initiate remediation

category_features.name: VPN
category_features.definition: Extend virtual private network over public networks to enable protected information exchange

category_features.name: Vulnerability Scanning
category_features.definition: Discover patch statuses and vulnerabilities

category_features.name: Backup Scheduling
category_features.definition: Allows automatic backups (with all filtering, compressing, transferring to the storage, and other)

category_features.name: Bare-Metal Restore
category_features.definition: Restore the physical Window Servers, Desktops and Laptops from the scratch

category_features.name: Compression
category_features.definition: Reduction in the number of bits needed to represent data

category_features.name: Continuous Backup
category_features.definition: Backup of computer data  automatically saving a copy of every change made to that data

category_features.name: Differential Backup
category_features.definition: Cumulative backup of all changes made since the last full backup

category_features.name: Disaster Recovery
category_features.definition: Plan and implement business continuity measures in case of unforeseen events

category_features.name: Encryption
category_features.definition: Convert data into a code for security

category_features.name: Incremental Backup
category_features.definition: A type of backup that only copies files that have changed since the previous backup

category_features.name: VM Backup
category_features.definition: Copying of data on a virtual machine (VM) in a VMware environment to prevent data loss

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based suite of cybersecurity solutions that help businesses identify, analyze and remediate threats on a unified platform.
related_products.features: Cloud-based suite of cybersecurity solutions that help businesses identify, analyze and remediate threats on a unified platform.

related_products.short_desc: Protect your business endpoints from ransomware, malware, hackers, and more with AVG Antivirus Business Edition.
related_products.features:
AVG Antivirus Business Edition protect your business from viruses, ransomware, and other online threats in real-time. Our top-rated antivirus protects your business from: hacker attacks, web and email threats and, the newest malware. You can choose between unmanaged and managed solutions.
AVG Cloud Management Console allows you to quickly deploy antivirus to multiple endpoints, manage policies, monitor threats, schedule updates, and protect devices.

related_products.short_desc: Wrike is an IT work management software with templates, Gantt charts, advanced security, automated approvals, and 400+ integrations.
related_products.features: Wrike is an IT work management software trusted by 20,000+ companies and over two million users. Streamline your IT management using custom request forms, Kanban boards, Gantt charts, time-tracking, automated workflows and approvals, budget management, and advanced reporting, all in one place. Integrate Wrike with 400+ applications such as GitHub for seamless development and tracking. Customize your workflows so you can see progress at every step. Transform your IT management with Wrike.

related_products.short_desc: Rippling makes it easy to manage your Payroll, Benefits, HR, and IT -- all in one, modern platform.
related_products.features:
Rippling makes it easy to manage your company's Payroll, Benefits, HR, and IT -- all in one, modern platform. It brings all of your employee systems and data together, and helps automate your busy work.

Take onboarding, for example. With Rippling, you can just click a button, and in 90 seconds set up a new hires payroll, health insurance, 401K, work computer, and apps  like Slack, Zoom, and Office 365.

related_products.short_desc: IT Management has never been more important than in today's remote environment. Integrates seamlessly with Zendesk, Jira etc.
related_products.features: Manage the complete IT asset lifecycle for your remote workforce with easy-to-use, cloud-based IT Management software. Reduce downtime, ensure software license compliance, and speed up troubleshooting by tracking all hardware including Windows/Mac devices as well as software. Maintain complete visibility into your IT landscape with full asset management, purchase orders, maintenance, usage optimization. Seamlessly integrated with Zendesk, Jira helpdesks, as well as SCCM, JAMF, many others.

Cross-platform, secure, high-speed screen sharing, cloud-based or on-premises license. 
Rich customization options allow you to rebrand the software to your own corporate identity and apply advanced security measures.

that enables IT pros to anticipate, troubleshoot, and document performance issues regardless of
where workloads, applications, or users are located.

Proactively anticipate user experience issues before they happen, provide the correlated analytics to troubleshoot the problem quickly when they do and documentation of root cause so that performance issues can be permanently resolved.

similar_products.short_desc: SysTrack is an IT management solution for IT teams to have clear visibility into their environments and end-user experience.

similar_products.short_desc: Network Performance Monitor (NPM) is affordable software that can help you detect, diagnose, and resolve network performance issues.
similar_products.features: SolarWinds Network Performance Monitor (NPM) is a powerful and affordable solution that can help you quickly detect, diagnose, and resolve network performance problems and outages. NPM provides advanced network troubleshooting for on-premise, hybrid, and cloud services with critical path hop-by-hop analysis. NPM's comprehensive coverage is designed to enable an IT professional to reduce mean outage time, see return on network investments & determine how to reallocate resources for future health.

similar_products.short_desc: The JumpCloud Directory Platform reimagines the directory as a complete platform for identity, access, and device management.
similar_products.features: JumpCloud's cloud directory enables internal IT departments, MSPs, VARs/distributors, and DevOps teams to securely and easily enable access to any IT resource, from anywhere. Streamline your IT management processes like onboarding and off-boarding with a centralized, OS-agnostic platform for IAM, MDM, MFA, and more.

Quickly browse through hundreds of Business Continuity tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Business Continuity software helps organizations to identify threats and plan for the prevention and recovery of information assets. These applications protect key organizational data in the event of a failure and in the wake of trouble, aid the rapid restoration of system function and data access. Typically Business Continuity solutions offer options for continuous or scheduled monitoring along with a variety of real-time data recovery tools. Backup storage can be maintained locally or routed to a remote server. Business Continuity software is related to Database Management software.

related_categories.description: IT Asset Management software provides enterprise wide inventory and life cycle management of software and hardware assets. This can include asset maintenance history, user permissions, acquisition budget forecasting, and software license compliance. This type of software enables IT managers to improve cost control and accurately track IT's business value throughout the organization. IT Asset Management software is related to Compliance software, License Management software, and IT Management software.

Quickly browse through hundreds of Network Monitoring tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. related_categories.description: Network Monitoring software assesses and evaluates computer systems and networks in order to maximize availability of system resources. These applications provide an integrated solution for ongoing observation, evaluation and forecasting as well as historical assessments. Organizations use the diagnostic tools provided by Network Monitoring software to identify problem areas and make strategic resource decisions regarding their technology operations. Network Monitoring software is related to Application Performance Management software, Network Security software and IT Management software.

Quickly browse through hundreds of Network Security tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Network Security software prevents unauthorized access to a computer network. Organizations use these applications to prevent unauthorized, malicious or inadvertent intrusions into or usage of secure systems. Network Security solutions are designed to recognize legitimate traffic over today's complex enterprise networks and isolate abnormal events for further investigation as well as to perform key security audit and regulatory compliance functions. Features can include anti-spam, anti-virus, and intrusion detection. Network Security software is related to Computer Security software and Network Monitoring software.

related_categories.description: Website Monitoring software provides monitoring and performance alerts of websites and web-based applications. Companies can easily monitor uptime, web performance and transaction performance as well as quickly determine the location of performance failures. Website monitoring solutions are used in nearly every industry, and most provide real time performance alerts on failures involving HTTP, DNS, TCP and transaction response time. Website Monitoring software is related to Requirements Management software, and Patch Management software.
